channel.title: Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Siemens Teamcenter MBSE Gateway
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the classpath. Find detailed remediation and mitigation information here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 11:40:33 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Silver Peak Orchestrator, Silver Peak GMS
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Security Advisory Notice Apache https://www.arubanetworks.com/website/techdocs/sdwan/docs/advisories/media/security_advisory_notice_apache_log4j2_cve_2021_44228.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Customer managed Orchestrator and legacy GMS products are affected by this vulnerability. This includes on-premise and customer managed instances running in public cloud services such as AWS, Azure, Google, or Oracle Cloud. See Corrective Action Required for details about how to mitigate this exploit.

Updated community note.
